entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Snow ending early this evening then clearing. Blowing snow over exposed areas early this evening. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 24 February 2023
